ProjectTitle: From Collective Trauma to Collective Identity: An Exegetical Study on the Language of Εἰρήνη in the Fourth Gospel
InitialFeedbackHistory:
08/07/2022
Data storage
You write "All primary data, notes made and work written will be stored locally and online on KU Leuven Box Cloud, KU Leuven drive, One Drive, Google Drive, and iCloud ". Maybe decide for one storage solution (and one backup). KU Leuven One Drive is probably best. There's no need to have copies all over the place. 

And to preserve data longterm (those that you generate, not the existing texts), you could use KU Leuven RDR: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
